text: Casey Kreiter (born August 13, 1990) is an American football long snapper for the New York Giants of the National Football League (NFL). He played college football at Iowa. == Professional career == ===Dallas Cowboys=== After going undrafted in the 2014 NFL Draft, Kreiter spent 2 training camps with the Dallas Cowboys in 2014 and 2015 but was unable to win the starting job either time. ===Denver Broncos=== In April 2016, Kreiter signed with the Broncos and won the starting job in July. Kreiter was placed on injured reserve on December 16, 2016. In 2019 Kreiter was selected to his first Pro Bowl. On March 7, 2019, Kreiter re-signed with the Broncos. ===New York Giants=== On April 1, 2020, Kreiter signed with the New York Giants. == References == == External links == * Denver Broncos bio * iowa Hawkeyes bio Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:American football long snappers Category:Dallas Cowboys players Category:Denver Broncos players Category:Iowa Hawkeyes football players Category:New York Giants players Category:People from DeWitt, Iowa Category:Players of American football from Iowa
title: Casey Kreiter
